judge_issues.message: Expenses ($396,080) exceed revenue ($181,050) by 119% - may be drawing down reserves
BBB name 'Latino Learning Center, Inc.' may not match 'Ar-Rahman Learning Center' (similarity: 67%)
Revenue diverges >80% across sources ($181,050 - $4,559,370) - different fiscal years (1 year spread)
Extremely high working capital (785.8 months) may indicate hoarding or data error

strengths_deep_dive: AR-Rahman Learning Center Inc demonstrates a strong commitment to financial leaness. By reporting <cite id="2">$4,559,370 in total revenue</cite> while maintaining <cite id="1">zero fundraising expenses</cite>, the organization ensures that donor contributions are not diluted by marketing or solicitation costs. Its programmatic focus on <cite id="1">Arabic language and Islamic studies</cite> is supported by a <cite id="1">program expense ratio of 84.1%</cite>, which is notably higher than many organizations in the <cite id="1">religious and cultural peer group</cite>. This efficiency is paired with an extraordinary <cite id="2">revenue growth rate of 4242.3%</cite>, suggesting a rapidly scaling donor base and increasing community trust.
rich_narrative.summary: AR-Rahman Learning Center Inc is a religious and humanitarian organization dedicated to providing <cite id="1">affordable education, healthcare, and social welfare services</cite>. Operating with a global geographic reach, the organization focuses on <cite id="1">Quran classes, Arabic language instruction, and Islamic studies</cite> to foster community development. In the 2023 tax year, the organization reported <cite id="2">total revenue of $4,559,370</cite>, representing a significant <cite id="2">3-year revenue CAGR of 4242.3%</cite>. This rapid growth has been accompanied by a commitment to operational efficiency, as evidenced by a <cite id="1">program expense ratio of 84.1%</cite>, which exceeds the <cite id="1">industry standard of 75%</cite>. Furthermore, the organization maintains <cite id="1">exceptional fundraising efficiency</cite>, spending <cite id="1">$0.00 to raise every $1</cite> in contributions. While the organization is currently in a growth phase, it has established a massive liquidity cushion with <cite id="1">785.8 months of working capital</cite>, ensuring long-term stability for its educational and social programs.
